https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null A history of homosexuality in South Africa from colonial times to the present. Estimates say that between 1910 and 1933 over 60,000 men were convicted of sodomy. They were overwhelmingly black and unable to afford legal representation. Apostles of Civilised Vice
